Plot: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.
Title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
Actors: Matt Damon, Gwyneth Paltrow, Jude Law, Cate Blanchett
tomatoConsensus: With Matt Damon's unsettling performance offering a darkly twisted counterpoint to Anthony Minghella's glossy direction, The Talented Mr. Ripley is a suspense thriller that lingers.
Awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 75 nominations.
